name: create-package

schema.title: Create a framework package
schema.description: Create a framework package that uses Nx CLI.

name.description: The package name of cli, e.g. `create-framework-package`. Note this must be a valid NPM name to be published.

project.description: The name of the generator project.
project.x-prompt: What is the name of the project for the generator?

unitTestRunner.description: Test runner to use for unit tests.

directory.description: A directory where the app is placed.

linter.description: The tool to use for running lint checks.

tags.description: Add tags to the library (used for linting).

skipTsConfig.description: Do not update tsconfig.json for development experience.

setParserOptionsProject.description: Whether or not to configure the ESLint `parserOptions.project` option. We do not do this by default for lint performance reasons.

compiler.description: The compiler used by the build and test targets.

importPath.description: How the plugin will be published, like `create-framework-app`. Note this must be a valid NPM name. Will use name if not provided.

e2eTestRunner.description: Test runner to use for end to end (E2E) tests.

description: Create a package which can be used by npx to create a new workspace
